description:
Zoro faces a fellow master of the blade, Sanji looks to end his fight with against a rampaging ramen master, and Franky finally lands a big blow against his CP9 foe!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Demon-Slasher Zoro vs. Ship-Slasher T-Bone!
Gare à la collision ! Le Demon Slash de Zoro contre le Boat Slash de T-Bone !
Gekitotsu! Onigiri Zoro VS Funekiri T-Bone
Ярость! Дьявольский резак Зоро против Корабельного рубаки Тибона
激突! 鬼斬りゾロVS船斬りTボーン
